pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 17, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 17, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

Toronto, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement.

Corus Entertainment
25 Dockside Drive
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.

6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of International Trade, Fran√ßois-Philippe Champagne, will attend the Canada-India Business Council Diwali dinner and deliver brief remarks. 

The Arcadian Court
401 Bay Street
8th Floor
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.
